players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob is dead, I have no idea what happened."
Diana: "I'm shocked by Bob's sudden death and call for transparency in our investigation to ensure the safety of our town."
Charlie: "Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the mafioso responsible for Bob's death. It's crucial we work together to keep our town safe and bring justice to Bob."

Diana: "I believe it's important that we all work together to ensure the safety of our town. Based on the information we have, I think it's suspicious that Alice was the last person to interact with Bob before his death. However, I also want to keep an..."
